input.sentences: we visited the most ancient parts of the city .
we also went out to the coast .
we climbed the steps up to the top .
output.sentences: Last year, members of my class visited an ancient city.
It was located on the coast, so when we were not studying the city we could chill on the harborfront.
The town itself was pretty and the ruins were well worth seeing.
One set of ruins had decaying steps, which we climbed as far as our tour guide allowed us to go.
It was high and we felt like we had completed an adventure to get to the top.
